name: Blockade (itch) (FreshWaterGames)
description:
Controls : Arrow keys / WASD  move, R  restart level, F1 full screen, esc to quit

This was a game made for FBLA (Future Business Leaders of America) the theme was puzzle/business and most of the mechanics that you wouldn't see in a puzzle game like lives are their because of the guidelines set by FBLA. But for the first game we made I think its a good start.  (I would recommend downloading Blockade since Godot has audio stutters when being played from html files.)
